dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3386181R] Violation of copyrights
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2007 6:22 PM
To: zzzzzz
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3386181R] Violation of copyrights

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Violation of copyrights
Added by system at Thursday, Mar 8 2007 12:21 am 
X-MailFrom: sales@phpcart.net 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Thu Mar 8 00:21:32 2007

  Thu, 8 Mar 2007 00:21:30 -0600

X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi 
X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist:  abuse@ev1servers.net

        by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id
7A3056080B 
        for <abuse@ev1servers.net>; Thu,  8 Mar 2007 00:21:30 -0600
(CST) 
Received: from HP751 [66.238.68.187] by mail.starstream.net with ESMTP 
  (SMTPD32-8.15) id AB9AF2B0128; Wed, 07 Mar 2007 22:22:18 -0800 
From: "PHPCart Sales" <sales@phpcart.net> 
To: <abuse@enom.com>, 
        <abuse@ev1servers.net>, 
        <abuse@theplanet.com> 
X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Violation of copyrights 
Subject: Violation of copyrights 
Date: Wed, 7 Mar 2007 22:19:07 -0800 
Message-ID: <19a301c76149$adc90dd0$640fa8c0@HP751> 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain; 
        charset="us-ascii" 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 
thread-index: AcdhSa0pNnYbcw8VTKqqXDDebA//kg== 
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 
X-IMAIL-SPAM-VALFROM: (ab960f2b0128beea) 
X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net 
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of
TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED  
Return-Path: sales@phpcart.net 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Mar 2007 06:21:30.0808 (UTC)
FILETIME=[02EF9B80:01C7614A] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello, 
 
Please be advised that this email servers as your due notice that you
are 
providing services to the website eazycart.com which is in violation of
U.S. 
copyright laws.  The program "eazycart" is a derived product of
"PHPCart" 
from phpcart.net.  The copyright notices have been removed from the
scripts 
and the documentation but you can easily check the validity of my claim
that 
this is copyright material by reviewing the long history of my product 
PHPCart and the short history of "eazycart".   
 
I respectfully request that you immediately cease providing any services
to 
the domain eazycart.com.  Failure to do so will require me to take legal

action against you. 
 
If you need any additional information or proof that the program
"eazycart" 
is a copyright violation please let me know what you require.  I have
code 
documented in my forum from many years that are snippets of code from
the 
copyrighted PHPCart program.  I also have full source code from the last
3 
years of every release of PHPCart. 
 
Please help me in this matter to prevent copyright infringement of my 
product. 
 
Thank you, 
George Hubert 
sales@phpcart.net
